# Streefi

> Street food exploration and dine-in discount application.

## Overview
Streefi connects foodies with authentic local street food vendors. Users can discover vendors, view menus, and get exclusive dine-in discounts. Vendors can list their business to reach more customers.

## Core Features
- **Discovery**: Find authentic street food vendors nearby.
- **Discounts**: Exclusive dine-in offers and deals.
- **Vendor Platform**: Dedicated app for vendors to manage their business.

## Site Structure
- [Home](https://streefi.in/) - Main landing page, feature showcase, and app download links.
- [Vendor Partner](https://streefi.in/vendor) - Information for street food vendors to join the platform.
- [Support](https://streefi.in/policies/support) - Customer support and contact information.
- [Policies](https://streefi.in/policies/policy) - Privacy policy, terms of service, and refund policies.

## App Links
- [Android App](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.streefi.customer)
- [iOS App](https://apps.apple.com/in/app/streefi/id6747432924)
- [Vendor App (Android)](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.streefi.vendor)
- [Vendor App (iOS)](https://apps.apple.com/in/app/streefi-vendor-partners/id6747433347)
